incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue for RCS Messaging Services Messages

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the Opt Out Failing for RCS Messaging Services Messages issue triggered by our automated alert, and it was determined that there is no noticeable customer impact. All systems are operational.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Opt Out Failing for RCS Messaging Services Messages. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Serverless production boxes lost connection with AuroraDB

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the duplicate porting orders issue triggered by our automated alert, and it was determined that there is no noticeable customer impact. All systems are operational.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with duplicate porting orders. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
